nodes.text: Star Wars Kids 3 is the third issue of Star Wars Kids magazine. It was published by The Fan Club, Inc. in April/May 1999. Beginning with issue 3, Star Wars Kids focused heavily on themes from the prequel film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. This issue featured portions of the comic stories X-Wing Marks the Spot and Imperial Spy, written by Mike W. Barr and first published in Scholastic's original Star Wars Kids magazine series.
